sentences.english: Use the thumbs and forefingers to guide the floss between the teeth.
sentences.chinese: 握緊牙線，用食指和拇指輕柔地在牙縫間操作牙線。

sentences.english: Just think of all those bits of food that would be left behind if we didn’t floss.
sentences.chinese: 如果不使用牙線的話，那些食物殘渣就會留在牙縫裏。
悲鳴從咬緊的牙縫中擠出。

sentences.english: To remove extraneous matter from(the teeth).
sentences.chinese: 從牙縫間的牙齦處流出來。

sentences.english: All the crevices must be cleared of remnant food.
sentences.chinese: 要把牙縫裏的殘餘食物都刷乾淨。

sentences.english: Slowly, he released his breath through clenched teeth.
sentences.chinese: 他從緊咬的牙縫間慢慢地舒了口氣。

sentences.english: Avoid eating anything that might stick to your teeth, like spinach.
sentences.chinese: 避免喫任何會塞牙縫的食物，比如菠菜。

sentences.english: When they’re fresh, she added, their exoskeletons don’t get stuck in your teeth.
sentences.chinese: 她補充說，如果蟲子新鮮，外殼是不會卡到牙縫裏的。

sentences.english: When they're fresh, she added, their exoskeletons don't get stuck in your teeth.
sentences.chinese: 她補充說，如果蟲子新鮮，外殼是不會卡到牙縫裏的。

sentences.english: There were ashes in his teeth.
He had a morsel of food caught between one tooth and another.
sentences.chinese: 一小塊食物嵌在他的牙縫裏。

sentences.english: So, the effect of tooth gap cleaning is favorable, and use is safe.
sentences.chinese: 從而，清理牙縫效果好，又安全可靠。

sentences.english: His clumsy tongue had finally forced this foolish confession past the teeth.
sentences.chinese: 他那拙劣的舌頭總算把這份愚蠢的供詞擠出了牙縫。

sentences.english: Mouthwash ingredients, can penetrate between the teeth, rapid removal of tartar, teeth stains.
sentences.chinese: 漱口水成份，能深入牙縫，快速地去除牙垢，牙漬。

sentences.english: Use the thumbs and forefingers to guide the floss between the teeth.
sentences.chinese: 用拇指和食指幫助把牙線前後移動輕輕壓入牙縫中。

sentences.english: Bacteria sticks to food debris in the teeth, causing decay.
sentences.chinese: 細菌附着在牙縫中的食物殘渣上，導致蛀牙。

definition: to choke on (food etc)/to swallow the wrong way
to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
to bore/to burrow/to crawl through a tunnel
with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]
